name: Aphotic Ardor
description:
Aphotic Ardor

Aphotic Ardor dark fantasy soulslike with text-based combat. 

Awakened in a dying realm cursed with undeath, face terrifying legendary knights and take your revenge.

Features:

  • A nonlinear open world to explore,
  • 4 different classes to play,
  • 7 unique enemies to fight in unique strategical turn-based combat,
  • A dark fantasy setting, a 6500 word story, and 54 areas.
